metadata.synopsis: A timid Italian bank clerk (Dustin Hoffman) tries to divorce his oversexed wife (Stefania Sandrelli) to marry his mistress (Carla Gravina).

reviews: There's an overwhelming fondness for his foolish creatures that permeates [Pietro Germi's] films and makes Alfredo Alfredo a joy.
After suffering through Papillon, Dustin Hoffman fans will no doubt welcome the actor's return to brighter days as a bumbling young lover in Pietro Germi's Alfredo Alfredo.
